labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: It doesn't disable the overlay, the switch just jumps back, and you get a lot of errors in console
data.short_description: It's not possible to disable the in-game overlay in user settings, if it was enabled and used in a game, and it will throw big errors in console
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to user settings -> Overlay - Enable the overlay - Start a game and open the overlay - Then go to user settings and attempt to disable the overlay on the switch
